meanings.definition: A state of nervousness or agitation.
meanings.sent1: She got the jimjams before her big presentation.
meanings.sent2: The loud noises gave him the jimjams.
meanings.sent3: His jimjams were evident as he tapped his foot anxiously.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds looming overhead filled her with jimjams.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the abandoned house sent shivers of jimjams down her spine.

meanings.sent1: She put on her cozy jimjams before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He loves wearing his favorite jimjams on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on her jimjams, purring contently.
meanings.sent4: His colorful jimjams stood out in the sea of plain sleepwear.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of her jimjams felt like a warm hug at the end of the day.
